Welcome to Gauss’s documentation!¶

Contents:

class gauss.Cwrap(filename)¶

This class represents a universal wrapper for Gaussian and Dacapo Calculations. With data from this class and by parsing information from the file name, we can compare data and get all pertinent data from python

get_ang(a1, a2, a3)¶

calculate angle from three points

get_pos()¶

get the positions of all the atoms
